item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

7/30/2012's location will be:
Geronimo Tequila Bar and Southwest Grill

Specials:

$5 draft beers
$5 house wines
$5 house margaritas

Geronimos has excellent food available as well. Check their menu on the website for more info.

http://www.geronimobarandgrill.com/

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Neil will host and can be reached at 203-928-9907.

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for / contact your Listed Host from the Event Description. (In this case Neil, 203-928-9907)
